name: Bajaj Allianz Life Insurance Company Limited
overview:
SUMMARY

· Having 8 years of experience in Life Insurance operations, Underwriting, Business Analysis, , Customer services, Branch Management (including Legal and Roll-out) and Renewals chasing activities. · Excellent communication, analytical and team management skills with hard work ability; Seeking challenging opportunities in Operations, Process Management, Claims Management, Business Analysis · Trained in the areas of Teamwork, Preventive, Time Management, Effective Communication Skills, , Team Management, Managerial Abilities and Motivation

DOMAIN SKILLS SUMMARY

· Excellent in handling Insurance Operations that includes customer service, Claims, NB processing, Renewal chasing –intimations, follow-up, motivating & managing the team to work for achieving targets, competitions, analysis of data, etc. · Trained in the areas of Teamwork, Preventive, Time Management, Effective Communication Skills, Team Management, Managerial Abilities and Motivation · Team Handling 5 Branches with 20 Team members in Operations, Accounts, Admin, Security & House Keeping Department Etc.,

ACHIEVEMENTS

· Excelled in the area of Operations Got Promotion As Assistant Branch Supervisor from Bajaj Allianz Sep-2008 for the outstanding achievement with a stiff competition among 96 branches 150 Staff members across Andhra Pradesh

relationships.title: Bajaj Allianz Life Insurance Company Limited
